snippet.title: Diablo IV | Inside the Game | Season of the Infernal Hordes
snippet.description:
Venture into Hell with the #DiabloIV devs to uncover the diabolical challenges and glorious rewards coming with Season of the Infernal Hordes.

💀 New wave-based Infernal Hordes feature
⚒️ 50+ New Uniques + Legendaries
😈Powerful Infernal Variant Foes
🔥 New Seasonal Rewards

Get your burning questions answered here:
https://news.blizzard.com/en-us/diablo4/24119591/slay-endless-demons-in-season-of-the-infernal-hordes

00:00 Intro
01:33 Seasonal Questline
02:11 The Infernal Hordes
04:33 Seasonal Progression
05:06 The Fell Council
06:42 Rewards
07:22 New Uniques and Legendaries
08:17 Death in the Infernal Hordes
